column4: hmmm. i'm attempting to back up my home dir to a NTFS drive but zip keeps failing with permission errors - probably because python, googlechrome, wine and a few other folders have symlinks that lead to /etc folders...how can I get around this?
could try --symlinks (looked at the manpage, idk)
i'm still without thumbnails :c now i have to read the file names
thanks, will give it a shot
